tit.e: Hiraki (first performance for a Noh actor, acting an important role)
tit.cmt: カッコ部分を補いました。
tit.e: Hiraki (first performance for a Noh actor, acting an important role)

sen.j: 披き（ひらき）とは、能楽師が、ある曲のシテもしくはそれに準ずる役、狂言、囃子などをはじめて演ずること。
sen.e: Hiraki is where a Nohgakushi (Noh actor) performs for the first time a shite (a main actor of a Noh play) or a quasi shite role for a certain music, Kyogen (farce played during a Noh play cycle), or hayashi (musical accompaniment played on traditional Japanese instruments).

Hiraki is what a Nohgakushi (Noh actor) performs for the first time as a shite (a main actor of a Noh play) or a quasi shite role for a certain music, Kyogen (farce played during a Noh play cycle), or hayashi (musical accompaniment played on traditional Japanese instruments).
sen.cmt: where→what と修正しました。as を挿入しました。
sen.e: Hiraki is what a Nohgakushi (Noh actor) performs for the first time as a shite (a main actor of a Noh play) or a quasi shite role for a certain music, Kyogen (farce played during a Noh play cycle), or hayashi (musical accompaniment played on traditional Japanese instruments).

sen.j: 特定の難曲や大曲についてしか用いない。
sen.e: It is only used for a specific difficult music piece or grand scale music.
It is only applied in a certain difficult music piece or grand scale music.
sen.cmt: used→applied, specific→certain と修正しました。
sen.e: It is only applied in a certain difficult music piece or grand scale music.

sen.j: 修行の成果を披露し、一定の技量を持つことを周囲に認めてもらうための興行として扱われることが多い。
sen.e: It is usually handled as a professional performance to display the result of an actor's training and to be recognized by those close to him that he has achieved a certain level of skill.
It is usually handled as a professional performance to show the result of an actor's training, and to be recognized by those close to him or her, that he or she has achieved a certain level of skill.
sen.cmt: display→show,カンマを補いました。”女性の能楽師も存在する”ということから文中を修正しました。
sen.e: It is usually handled as a professional performance to show the result of an actor's training, and to be recognized by those close to him or her, that he or she has achieved a certain level of skill.

sen.j: 披きの場合には番組の曲名右肩に「披キ」と書きくわえられることもある。
sen.e: In the case that it is a hiraki, sometimes the word 'hiraki' is added to the right of the name of the music in the program.
In the case of a hiraki, sometimes the word 'hiraki' is added to the right of the name of the music in the program.
sen.cmt: that it is→of と修正しました。
sen.e: In the case of a hiraki, sometimes the word 'hiraki' is added to the right of the name of the music in the program.

sen.j: そのことによって、第一に修行成った披露であることの意、第二にそれゆえ未熟であるがそのことを承知で見ていただきたいという意を示す。
sen.e: By doing so, it expresses firstly, that the program is a presentation of the training result, and secondly, that the actor is still lacking in experience and would like the audience to view with acknowledgement of that fact.

By doing so, it indicates these meanings, first, the program is a presentation of the training result, and secondly, the actor is still lacking in experience and would like the audience to see the performance with the acknowledgment of that fact.
sen.cmt: 文脈より修正しました。acknowledgement→acknowledgment と修正しました。
sen.e: By doing so, it indicates these meanings, first, the program is a presentation of the training result, and secondly, the actor is still lacking in experience and would like the audience to see the performance with the acknowledgment of that fact.
